ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Start_Date__c )), (Start_Date__c - TODAY() <15) , NOT(INCLUDES( Exception__c , 'Activity Start Date occurred in the past')), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a date 15 days Prior to Start Date of the Activity. Exception: If the activity happened in past, please select the date in past and select the Exception as ‘Activity Start Date occurred in the Past’
